comments.author: Arnold Schilham, UMCU
comments.creator: generate_config_json.py version 20180219

params.OCR_MechIndex:prefix: text in bounding box of OCR_MechIndex starts with this
params.OCR_MechIndex:type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_MechIndex should be of this type
params.OCR_MechIndex:xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_MechIndex
params.OCR_TissueIndex:prefix: text in bounding box of OCR_TissueIndex starts with this
params.OCR_TissueIndex:type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_TissueIndex should be of this type
params.OCR_TissueIndex:xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_TissueIndex

usage: "OCR_xxx:prefix": "mm" # text in bounding box of OCR_xxx starts with this and this should be stripped
"OCR_xxx:suffix": "mm" # text in bounding box of OCR_xxx ends with this and this should be stripped
